name: Eco Blocks
description:
Play it fullscreen, the game will adapt any screensize.

Drag and drop the blocks onto the grid in order to create vertical or horizontal lines.

The grid is cleared, if you make a block line out of the same kind of blocks. You loose if you are unable to place any blocks.

This game is realy small kb vise, it is only 27kb even though it has sounds and music. A new record for me.
